description: Object containing information about income summary totals in the retrieved tax calculation.

totalSelfEmploymentProfit.description: Total self employment profit. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalPropertyProfit.description: Total property profit. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalUKOtherPropertyProfit.description: Total UK other property profit. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalForeignPropertyProfit.description: Total foreign property profit. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalEmploymentIncome.description: Total employment income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.
